scripts.build: export INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false && react-scripts build && npm run zip-build
scripts.build:prod: export INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false && react-scripts build && npm run zip-build && npm run move-files
scripts.build:one: export INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false && node ./build-rewired.js && npm run clean && npm run move-index
scripts.clean: cd build && mv static/js/*.js big-omega-tools.js && mv static/css/*.css big-omega-tools.css && rm -r static
